data:
Facsimile Images

[M(arco)] Rubellino
P(ubli) f(ilio) Publ(lilia) Ces[tiano tribu]no
milit(tum) leg(ionis) [X]X [Val(eriae)? Vic(tricis)? et? leg(ionis)?]
[X]X[II?] Prim<i>g(eniae)[---]
5p̣[atr]o[no? flam(ini) divor(um) Aug(ustorum) per]p(etuo)
IIvir(o) q̣[u]i[nq(uennali) ite]ṛụ[m?]
c[ol?(oniae)? Aug(usta)? Lilybitan(orum)?]

Apparatus criticus

Text of Silvestrini 2020

translation

commentary

Preliminary notice in Silvestrini 2014, full edition in Silvestrini 2020. The same name of Rubellinus is found in ISic000492 = CIL 10.7212, now in Mazara del Vallo.

bibliography

    Silvestrini 2014 209 fig.4 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001581 Silvestrini 2020 294-298 no.1 with figs.1-3 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002609
